aligner.description: choice of aligner: star_salmon, star_rsem, hisat2

gene_bed.description: S3 path to BED file containing gene intervals

fasta.description: S3 path to genome FASTA file

transcript_fasta.description: S3 path to transcript FASTA file

gencode.description: Specify if it is gencode GTF: true, false

additional_fasta.description: S3 path to additional FASTA file: e.g. spike-in sequences

save_trimmed.description: save trimmed fastqs in results dir: true, false

save_merged_fastq.description: save merged fastqs in results dir: true, false

save_reference.description: save aligner index to results directory: true, false

salmon_quant_libtype.description: override salmon inferred lib types: IU, ISR, ISF for paired-end, U, SR, SF for single-end

skip_alignment.description: skip all alignment-based processes: true, false

skip_pseudo_alignment.description: skip all psuedo-alignment-based processes: true, false

gtf_group_features.description: attribute type to group features in the GTF when using salmon: gene_id, transcript_id

remove_ribo_rna.description: remove reads from rRNA: true, false
